title: FS:  T206 Cobb Red SGC 60 & Green SGC 50 SALE PENDING

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Cobb Red SGC 60 & Green SGC 50 SALE PENDING
posts.post_content:
Have this pair of beauties for sale.  Asking $7,000 for the pair, or $4,100 for the Green and $3,200 for the Red separately.  Email me at [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you're interested.

Thanks for looking!

Link to larger scan:

[url]https://goo.gl/photos/2Yy1Kw4CbSRe5d87A[/url]
Wow, those are beauties.  Man, those cards are over 100 years old -- look at those pearly white borders!  Wished I had $7K laying around...
